name: Twilight Falls - Sun Village
description:
Your hometown, the dark-worshipping town of Moon Village, has been utterly destroyed by a light dragon. You're lucky enough that the light-worshipping town of Sun Village has taken you in.

And you will get revenge. For your friends, your family, and yourself.

-

  • Play as male, female or nonbinary!
  • Have the ability to romance men, women and/or NB people!
  • An actual story, unlike most of my games.
  • 9 main romance options, 6 'secret' ones.
  • Different endings based on your choices!

Currently only the prologue and one chapter are playable.
